data.actual_result: sad days when client reloads, it takes a while
data.expected_result: the video should just delete and u can go about you daily discord ways
data.short_description: Having a youtube video deleted as it is getting ready to load, client reloads (note: this took 6 times of testing)
data.steps_to_repro: - have someone put a youtube link in a chat - hit play - have them delete it right as u hit play
